document_data.name: Eldeth Feldrun
document_data.mainbody: '''Eldeth Feldrun''' was a [[shield dwarf]] scout who was made a prisoner of the [[drow]] during the late 1480s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Eldeth lived with her family in [[Gauntlgrym]], where she worked as a scout.

In the late 1480s DR, Eldeth was captured by the drow slavers of [[Velkynvelve]] and had been attempting to return home.
document_data.Personality: The dwarf was high-spirited, defiant and self-sacrificing, and she had great pride in her heritage and in her people's recent reclamation of Gauntlgrym. She was also stubborn and hated [[drow]] and other "corrupt dark dwellers" like [[derro]] and [[duergar]].
